name: The Crew of the Beetle
description:
Help the crew reach the exit in their prize ship -- The Beetle. The Beetle used to be a mighty ship, but those days are far behind it. Navigate 15 different levels with an assortment of control panels and equipment by connecting the two together in whatever way you can.

Click a connection point to begin creating a wire, and click a different connection point to complete it. Click wires to remove them. Wires can only connect controls and parts, not controls to controls or parts to part. A control can connect to multiple parts, but parts cannot connect to multiple controls.
